body.head: Paul Weingarten (born Brünn [Brno], Moravia, April 20, 1886; died Vienna, April 11, 1948)

div.p: Paul Weingarten (born Brünn [Brno], Moravia, April 20, 1886; died Vienna, April 11, 1948), pianist and teacher.

Weingarten taught piano at the Akademie für Musik und darstellende Kunst (= Vienna Conservatory) 1922 to 1938 and after World War II, 1945 to 1948. His pupils included Moura Lympany, Hans Redlich, Peter Stadlen, and Friedrich Wildgans.
Source:oeML Online; MGG Tittel, Ernst, Die Wiener Musikhochschule (Vienna: Lafite, 1967)
